subclassFeature.name: Forge Master
entries: Forge Master wizards study the 9 hells and the abyss in order to manipulate and control the denizens of those blasted wastes. Forge Masters use demons as other people use tools; for both destruction and creation and they hold complete unwavering control over their summoned horde.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: Beginning when you select this school at 2nd level you gain proficiency with either {@item Carpenter's Tools|PHB}, {@item Cobbler's Tools|PHB}, {@item Leatherworker's Tools|PHB}, {@item Mason's tools|PHB}, {@item Smith's Tools|PHB}, or {@item Woodcarver's Tools|PHB}. You can use this set of tools as an {@item arcane focus|PHB} for casting your wizard spells.

subclassFeature.name: Fiendish Summons
entries: At 2nd level you add the {@spell find familiar} spell to your spell book if it is not already there. Your familiar can take the form of an {@creature Imp} or a {@creature Quasit}.

subclassFeature.name: Demonic Undead
entries: Starting at 6th level whenever you cast a spell to raise an undead creature you can instead summon a fiend whose challenge rating is no higher than 1/3 of your level rounded down. If a spell lets you summon more than one undead you can summon multiple fiends but the combined challenge rating of all of the summoned fiends must still be equal to or less than 1/3 of your level in this class. Any fiends summoned in this way can make a charisma saving throw at the beginning of its turn against your spell save DC. On a success the creature is no longer under your control and lasts for {@dice 1d4} rounds before disappearing.

subclassFeature.name: Bigger and Better
entries: Starting at 10th level the fiends you summon are more powerful. You can now summon any fiend whose CR is equal to or lower than half your wizard level rounded down. In addition all fiends you summon have the following benefits while under your control:

items: The fiend spawns with a number of temporary hit points equal to your wizard level.
The fiend adds your intelligence modifier to all attack rolls and saving throws it makes.

subclassFeature.name: Master of the Damned
entries: Once you reach 14th level your control over your fiends is unbreakable. You cannot lose {@status concentration} on a spell used to summon a fiend while you are conscious and fiends you summon can no longer break free of your control.
